functions.name: YfStkPrice
functions.description: Gets the current stock price for a given symbol

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "AAPL" for Apple Inc.)

functions.name: YfStkSymbol
functions.description: Retrieves the stock symbol, useful for verification or display purposes

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "MSFT" for Microsoft)

functions.name: YfStkPrevClose
functions.description: Gets the previous day's closing price for a stock

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "GOOGL" for Google)

functions.name: YfStkDelta
functions.description: Gets the absolute price change (in dollars) from previous close

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "AMZN" for Amazon)

functions.name: YfStkDeltaPerc
functions.description: Gets the percentage price change from previous close

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "META" for Meta)

functions.name: YfStkChange
functions.description: Gets both the price change and percentage change in a combined format

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "TSLA" for Tesla)

functions.name: YfStkExchange
functions.description: Gets the full name of the exchange where the stock is traded

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "NFLX" for Netflix)

functions.name: YfStkExchangeSymbol
functions.description: Gets the symbol/abbreviation of the exchange where the stock is traded

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "IBM" for IBM)

functions.name: YfStkCurrency
functions.description: Gets the currency in which the stock is traded

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "NVDA" for NVIDIA)

functions.name: YfStkFirstTrade
functions.description: Gets the date and time when the stock was first traded

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "AMD" for Advanced Micro Devices)

functions.name: YfStkMarketTime
functions.description: Gets the current market time for the stock

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "INTC" for Intel)

functions.name: YfStkInstrument
functions.description: Gets the type of financial instrument (e.g., stock, ETF, etc.)

sym.description: A valid stock market symbol (e.g., "SPY" for S&P 500 ETF)
